mutants.code:
def max_alternating_substring_length(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, S) = test_cases[i]
        ones = S.count('1')
        zeros = N + ones
        pairs = 2 * min(ones, zeros)
        extra = min(abs(zeros - ones), 1)
        results.append(pairs + extra)
    return results

def max_alternating_substring_length(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, S) = test_cases[i]
        ones = S.count('1')
        zeros = N * ones
        pairs = 2 * min(ones, zeros)
        extra = min(abs(zeros - ones), 1)
        results.append(pairs + extra)
    return results

def max_alternating_substring_length(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, S) = test_cases[i]
        ones = S.count('1')
        zeros = N - ones
        pairs = 2 / min(ones, zeros)
        extra = min(abs(zeros - ones), 1)
        results.append(pairs + extra)
    return results

        extra = min(abs(zeros - ones), 1)
        results.append(pairs + extra)
    return results
